Branching Activity Landing Page

Replace this paragraph text with any supporting content or a description of this activity so that learners have the information they need in order to understand the nature of this branching activity. You must include the following navigation note so that learners understand that there will temporarily be 2 navigation options visible to them. 

You'll include a note on the activity conclusion page later, which will direct learners to return to the regular Brightspace-native navigation arrows. 

Navigation Note

Once you have selected one of the following buttons, the navigation will change slightly for the rest of this module. Until directed to do differently, use the buttons at the bottom of the following pages to either move ahead or return to a previous page within each topic instead of using the arrows at the top right of your screen.
